message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal for a product worth much more. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low.  I'm willing to come down to $10,000. This is still a fair price for both of us, and it leaves some room for a win-win situation. What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $10,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $8,500. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I can't go lower than $9,500. This is a fair compromise considering the value of the product. I'm confident this will be a great investment for you, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but I'm really looking to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $8,000. This is my final offer, so please let me know if it's acceptable.
